description: This Dart source file defines enums and data classes used for user preference filtering in a Flutter application. It includes enums for categorical options like hair color, race, and religion, as well as a generic Range class for numeric ranges, and a comprehensive FilterCriteria class that encapsulates user preferences for filtering criteria.

classes.name: Range
classes.description: A generic immutable class representing a numeric range with minimum and maximum bounds, used for height and weight ranges.

classes.name: FilterCriteria
classes.description: An immutable class encapsulating filter preferences including sets of categories and numeric ranges for height and weight.

methods.name: copyWith
methods.description: Returns a new FilterCriteria instance with selectively overridden preference fields.
